DOC.brief_summary: Aim With retrospective study , investigator would like evaluate , possible confirm , whether early revalvulation right ventricular outflow tract good late revalvulation . Up , analysis do validate policy change . Patient selection All patient register database paediatric congenital cardiology University Hospitals Leuven , sufficient follow-up data , underwent transannular patch repair include study . Methodology statistical analysis All file review demographic , electrocardiographic , echocardiographic , outcome data . Besides descriptive statistic , Cox regression perform detect whether time period repair revalvulation influence clinical outcome ( define death , heart failure hospitalization , redo-revalvulation , implantation automatic defibrillator , endocarditis ) .
DOC.brief_title: Early Revalvulation After Fallot Repair Improves Clinical Outcome
DOC.criteria: Tetralogy Fallot patient repair transannulaire patch .
